thread.section_title: The Towers at Lotte New York Palace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A Timeless Hotel
thread.title_full: A Timeless Hotel - Review of The Towers at Lotte New York Palace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Matt P
title: A Timeless Hotel
text: I stayed here on a whim one night as I was stuck in the city with work and my stay here was anything short of phenomenal. The standard room was gorgeous, beautifully laid out and spacious. From the minute you walk into the beautiful lobby you truly feel that you are in the epicenter of New York City luxury. This is a must stay for anyone visiting, or like myself stuck in the city in need of a room for the night!
